short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide favicons from your Google Search results! Less cluttered, less painful.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Live a less cluttered life, by hiding favicons in Google Search results.

Google added tiny favicon icons to their search results this week for some reason. This adds clutter to once was a clean interface. This chrome extension undoes the effort by removing these favicons from your search results.
